website_summaries.verdict: Durable wheel covers that are protective, easy to put on, and work very well on the tires they fit.
pros: Basic and easy to use on parked vehicles
Sturdy with dual layers of protection
Have earned praise from owners for staying put in windy conditions
Available in two sizes, in a pack of two
cons: Rare size discrepancies have been reported – too tight or too loose fit for some tires

customer_reviews.title: This is my second pair - these are the only ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair - these are the only ones that really work for battling the weather head only. I had a pair of these before and eventually they became cracked and worn - but what can you expect - sun snow rain - so three years later I bought a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Burns

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, heavy-weight, yet very pliable. Fits my 11'-wide tires, as stated. (Too bad other manufacturers do not make the width known.) To fasten the cinch at the bottom, ya' gotta roll around in the dirt and and manage it all one-handed, but I think this is true with all brands. I left it unfastened and the covers stayed in place in a 15-20 mph gusty wind. I believe they would withstand a lot stronger gusts. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well and Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and look really good too. They were very easy to put on once I extended the black strap a bit. They even fit over the wheel lock we have on one of the tires. I am very pleased. I did find a tire cover size chart on the internet so that I knew what size to order. I am glad that I did as I probably would have ordered too small without the chart. Would be nice if they had the chart here, but it was easy enough to find. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit tires larger than 29.5 inches
customer_reviews.text: Description states they are for 29" to 31.75" Tire Diameters. My tires are 29.5. The straps barely reach. One pair the straps went together easy with them adjusted out the whole way. The second set I really had to work to get them snapped together. Took one of each off and compared them. The second set the straps are sewn on about 3/4 of an inch higher. This moves them up the radius of the tire. Which means the straps need to be longer. It comes down to poor quality control. There is no way this set would fit tires larger than 29.5 inches in diameter. Vinyl material seems heavy enough. We will see how well they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: They fit our wheels perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We are using these four wheel covers on our class C motorhome. They fit our wheels perfectly, and have remained in position, even though I didn't use the included strap. They look nice and they are protecting our wheels from the sun, rain and snow. I would definitely buy these again if the need arises
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love is a strong pretty strong term for tire covers
customer_reviews.text: Love is a strong pretty strong term for tire covers. Maybe if they last for a couple of years I'll be strongly infatuated. We'll see. But these covers are well assembled and seem to be of good material. I'm well satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the size needed for my RV and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size needed for my RV and the packaging says they are the right size, but when I took them from the package, they were way too small! Hoping they will take them back, at least
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, and it works.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these covers were easy to install, but this is my first and only set. Formed to fit the tire really well, and not difficult to secure. The clip seemed easy to adjust. An earlier posting somewhere mentioned a broken clip. If that happens, it shouldn't be difficult to secure by tying.
customer_reviews.author: JWoods

customer_reviews.title: Protect Your Tires
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty good and I think my tires will last a bit longer as my car is parked outside in full sun. Sadly, one of the snaps disintegrated in the first day but I can probably get a replacement without too much bother. The fabric looks pretty good and quite thick so the protection should be adequate. A reasonable price helps satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: fish0143

customer_reviews.title: love them. been on for a few months and ...
customer_reviews.text: love them. been on for a few months and the weather, (hot sun) has not dried them out. Working well and love the straps to keep the cover on during high winds.
customer_reviews.author: indymojo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.  Thick and fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Fit really well and are nice and thick. The strap that goes behind the tires is hard to install if your trailer is low and also a hassle if its parked on dirt or gravel or grass. Would prefer these to have a wire in the back hem to allow them to be held in place that way as others I've used in the past. These look to be rugged and expect to last several years in the TX heat and sun.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Well made product.
customer_reviews.text: These work really well although it takes a little effort to secure the latches on the inside of the wheel. I just leave them unattached. I have them on my trailer and my sports car. Neither is used often so I wanted protection from dirt and the elements. They provide it well.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: A must for you RV storage
customer_reviews.text: If you are storing you RV, these are a must. The sun kills tires, ask anyone who has blown and RV tire. It always happens in the worst possible location. Save you tires, save you life and save the hassle. These are well made and the price is right. Easy to install with a strap that keeps them in place when the wind picks up...
customer_reviews.author: LowJack

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly base on their specifications. Durable first ones lasted for > 5 years. Like the clips that hold the covers in place even in strong winds. Great product for the money
customer_reviews.author: Steve MP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to cover the wheels/tires on my Flagstaff HW27KS popup camper which is stored outside. They fit perfectly, and the nylon straps/clips hold the covers onto the wheels very securely. A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Flinn

customer_reviews.title: the wheel covers do an excellent job of protecting my wheels from direct sunlight and ...
customer_reviews.text: While slightly larger than the tire itself, the wheel covers do an excellent job of protecting my wheels from direct sunlight and the local stray neighborhood cats that insist my wheels are their personal restroom.
customer_reviews.author: W. Nicola

customer_reviews.title: Nicely Made
customer_reviews.text: Covers seem to be well constructed - fit well - easy to install except for the safety strap. Whether they last a couple of years remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty vinyl on the outside, fleece-like lining on the inside. Easy to hook up in the back with fastex buckles. Looks like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Scouter Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these covers.
customer_reviews.text: These are a great heavy duty tire cover. I'm very pleased with them and they fit over my 28 inch tires perfectly. They come in a two pack so you need to order 2 sets to get four covers. I would recommend these over the cheap light duty ones.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to help cover the wheels of our vintage airstream during the winter months. Previous reviews helped me make my decision and I’m glad I purchased these. They fit like a glove, seem very snug and secure. The added adjustable bucket is a great feature to keep them on during windy days. I just got them, so they haven’t been through a New England winter yet, but I’m confident they’ll hold up just fine!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevinedge

customer_reviews.title: "TIRE SAVER"
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is suppose to do, keeps the sun from damaging your camper and utility trailer tires. Don't forget to remove them when you go camping. HaHa
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to near impossible to fasten buckle.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to fasten these behind the wheel unless you lift the trailer off the ground and crawl underneath it. They look shiny but will go in the trash as to late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Didn't used it for a long time but they fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't used it for a long time but they fit as expected and they look thick so uv protectant. I use it for my classic car in addition with a car cover
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Plancq

customer_reviews.title: I recommned this product.
customer_reviews.text: High quality material. I like the way it fastens around the back of the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. Harris

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: fits very tight on my tires even though we are not at max on the specs by 2 inches
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Green

customer_reviews.title: Product appears to be good other than receiving damaged.
customer_reviews.text: 2 out of 4 covers came with slits cut into them. One small slit and one larger. Unfortunately I did not have time to return and/or replace since I was leaving location where item was being used in another state. Had to repair item with vinyl repair kit and hopefully this suffices until return in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Easily slides over tire and has clasps around bottom to fully secure in high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Blake R

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit on my 6x10 cargo trailer. The wheels are 15 inch and it completely covers them from top to bottom. Easy to put on and remove. The straps are pointless as the covers hug the wheel thanks to the elastic lining on top.
customer_reviews.author: Karmjeet B.

customer_reviews.title: ... in the back rather then a bungee tie seems like they will last
customer_reviews.text: These are built well and clicking straps in the back rather then a bungee tie seems like they will last. Much better then the pair I had before these.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Barter

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine, there is an adjustable strap so you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit fine, there is an adjustable strap so you can work with that. These are heavier than what we expected, so that is a plus!!
customer_reviews.author: granny s

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit, so measure your wheels. Mine are just the normal ones that came with a Keystone Bullet and they're definitely at the max size for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Put on my motorcycle enclosed trailer. Easy to put on.....look great too.....highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great! There's even a strap so they don't blow off in the wind!
customer_reviews.text: These were very good quality, fit well and even had a strap with a clip that goes behind the tire so the covers do not blow off in the wind! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D Coppola

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: It covers the tires very well and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: bruno

customer_reviews.title: Order one size Bigger
customer_reviews.text: Fits good. Easy to install. I hope they make my trailer tires last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dogface

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I Park my RV in the drive way and noticed my tires getting damaged from the sun. The covers protect my tires but might be too soon to tell.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Working good so far. Fairly easy to put on and off with the buckle clips.
customer_reviews.author: P. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality tire covers
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality tire covers. I use them on my tow dolly to protect the tires from sun while camping and at home, since the tires will likely age out before wearing out. Includes strap with snap buckle to prevent possible loss in high wind.
customer_reviews.author: LLCraig

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice fit, straps to secure them are not log enough, had to use bungies
customer_reviews.author: John Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They were higher quality than I already had. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jodisway

customer_reviews.title: These fit well and seem to be made of good materials. You do have to climb under trailer ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit well and seem to be made of good materials. You do have to climb under trailer to snap the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Price

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and take off and very secure
customer_reviews.text: Feels very durable These fit the R15 trailer tires on my Winnie Drop perfectly. Easy to put on and take off and very secure. Couldn't ask for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Stiller

customer_reviews.title: Great material. Strap is to hard to get around ...
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Strap is to hard to get around unless u have to. Mine are fine just sitting on tires
customer_reviews.author: Life is short

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine
customer_reviews.text: As advertised and fit well. Only a 4 due to ties being a little cheap. Will probably have to get better ones in future.
customer_reviews.author: Alan davidson

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl is excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to reach behind to buckle. Next time I'll get the covers with a wire sewn into the seam. Vinyl is excellent quality!
customer_reviews.author: J Horton

customer_reviews.title: High quality product.
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, and fit perfect. These are easy to put on and secure as well as being a thick, durable, high quality vinyl. Look great and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Tire and rim saver!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and seem to be holding up well in the sun and heat
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Used for a single axle cargo conversion trailer to keep the sun off the wheels. Stays in place during high wind and rain events.
customer_reviews.author: Shane C Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality Product, easy to install. No worries about blowing away. Heavy material appears to have some longevity. Overall a good option.
customer_reviews.author: D Boyd

customer_reviews.title: New product for me
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had the need to try them yet, but they look good, seem to be of good quality and hopefully will be easy to put on the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Edie F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, price and service excellent. They will definitely protect our camper tires.
customer_reviews.author: Bingo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they worked even during hurricane Irma; all covers stayed on
customer_reviews.author: haga

customer_reviews.title: If was a lot better than I expectec
customer_reviews.text: If was a lot better than I expectec. The straps to that wrap around are very useful to keep them from flying off on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: buyer40

customer_reviews.title: Not the most durable covers
customer_reviews.text: These looked great to start, but shortly after a year of use, they became brittle and started cracking. I guess the Sacramento sun was too much for them.
customer_reviews.author: kfed

customer_reviews.title: I like these covers.
customer_reviews.text: Easy and fits great with elastic to make sure it stays on even in the wind. Great protection against uv rays
customer_reviews.author: Scoots

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my tires and have connectors which hold them in place during high winds
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: These will fit a variety of tire sizes as they ...
customer_reviews.text: These will fit a variety of tire sizes as they are adjustable. They still look new after six months in the salt air.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They even have a clip strap to attach the inside cover edges. Well made.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Great tire covers for my RV. Stayed in placed during a severe thunderstorm.

customer_reviews.title: Quality material
customer_reviews.text: These fit my trailer tires nice. I like you can buckle it up tight.

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, came quickly and very easy to use Sall

customer_reviews.title: RV Wheel Covers
customer_reviews.text: These covers are well constructed and have very well designed straps for securing to wheels.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Live the fact they have clips to secure.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY G

customer_reviews.title: Tire Protection
customer_reviews.text: Covers my RV Tires and Protects them! Excellent product to protect the Expensive Tires on our RV!!!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and is not skimpy either. A bit lighter gauge material that I expected but seems to do the job as required.
customer_reviews.author: pierre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit looks great , will buy more for another trailer
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: The tire covers fit as expected and fasten securely so I don't have to worry about them getting blown away in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sitler

customer_reviews.title: They're very nice, we like them for our motorhome
customer_reviews.text: They're very nice, we like them for our motorhome ....
customer_reviews.author: Valeree

customer_reviews.title: It was so nice to just order
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly, and are just what we needed. It was so nice to just order, and have them show up like magic! Much better than traipsing from store to store, hoping to find what you need.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Svec

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my new tires
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for my new tires. I wish there was a way to snap them and then cinch them without having to get underneath the boat.
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: RV tire covers
customer_reviews.text: Good buy for the price, tire covers fit and work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fit perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fit perfect. Soft flannel inside to protect your wheels. Good nylon tie strap with adjustable click lock fasteners.

customer_reviews.title: Good product as expected
customer_reviews.text: Installed 2 days ago. Easy install. Good fit. No issues as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I will have to see how they hold up over the winter.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: So far so good perfect fit. I use them for my boat trailer tires and they have been holding up to all the weather conditions.

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great, quality material and perfect fit.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say. As advertised, durable, easy to install. Happy to recommend product

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend these covers!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was happy with the durability. They fit perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Good covers for trailer wheels
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with these covers. Went on easily, strap holds them secure.

customer_reviews.text: Covers appear to be made well. The fit was good . I would recommend to anyone

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was described. Easy to use and good quality for the price point.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be just fine. Arrived promptly and are staying on in wind.

customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to extend the life of my trailer tires, great fit and good quality

product_meta.title: TCP Global Set of 2 Waterproof Vinyl RV Wheel & Tire Covers, Fits 26.75" to 29" Tire Diameters, Weatherproof Tire Protectors
feature_bullets: Set of 2 High Quality Vinyl RV Wheel Covers for 26.75" to 29" tire diameters, Fits up to 11" deep-wide tires, Includes 3 year warranty
Waterproof and weatherproof, a must have for summer or winter storage by keeping the sun, rain or snow from damaging your tires
Made of heavy duty flannel backed waterproof vinyl with an elastic inner edge and a nylon strap buckle to keep them secure in any weather conditions
Ideal for use on RV's, trailers, campers, cars & trucks, motor homes or anything with the correct tire size
Easy to install, remove and clean; Snug fitting: Out performs competitive brands; Reuse over again and again

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars249 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
